Package tech.tablesaw.api

Interface CategoricalColumn

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Column
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IntConvertibleColumn
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanColumn, DateColumn, NumberColumn, StringColumn

    public interface CategoricalColumn
extends Column
    A column type that can be summarized, or serve as a grouping variable in cross tabs or other aggregation operations.

    The column data is discrete.

    Supporting subtypes include: - StringColumn - BooleanColumn - DateColumn, - others

    Floating point types (float, double) and near-continuous time columns (Time and DateTime) are not included.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface tech.tablesaw.columns.Column

        append, appendCell, asBytes, asDoubleArray, byteSize, clear, columnWidth, copy, countMissing, countUnique, emptyCopy, emptyCopy, first, getDouble, getString, getUnformattedString, isEmpty, isMissing, isNotMissing, lag, last, lead, name, print, rolling, rowComparator, setName, size, sortAscending, sortDescending, subset, summary, title, type, unique
